sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2005/L.4), SBSTA notes that it has considered document FCCC/SBSTA/2004/INF.10 containing options for using web-based approaches for sharing information and experiences on 'good practices' among Annex I Parties.
SBSTA also welcomes the round-table discussion, recalls the upcoming Secretariat report on 'good practices' and agrees to consider next steps at SBSTA 24.
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
